title: P_C_OBJECT
description: Abstract model of constraint on any kind of object node.
$comments: Defined in P_aom2 IM, abstract, inherits from P_ARCHETYPE_CONSTRAINT

rm_type_name.description: Reference model type that this node corresponds to.

occurrences.description: Occurrences of this object node in the data, under the owning attribute. Upper limit can only be greater than 1 if owning attribute has a cardinality of more than 1.

node_id.description: Semantic id of this node, used to differentiate sibling nodes of the same type. Each node_id must be defined in the archetype ontology as a term code.
